function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Underutilization of blockchain and dlt for relief fund distribution","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of exploration of cloud computing for covid-19 response","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Failure to protect privacy and confidentiality when using big data for disease modeling and monitoring human behavior","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Issues with blockchain technology adoption for protecting health information and monitoring outbreak data","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of research on the impact of vr and ar technologies on disease propagation in educational settings","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of guidelines for safe implementation of vr and ar technologies in public places for security and patrol purposes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on ai/ml/dl for critical healthcare decisions leading to potential errors or biases","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on 5g for remote healthcare services leading to potential data security and privacy risks","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on iot devices for covid-19 management","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data privacy and security risks with iot devices","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in affected areas","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of robots and drones for quarantine assistance and containment of covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Usage of drones for delivery and transportation during the pandemic","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Robotic-assisted surgery ras during the pandemic","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global increase in medical device sales","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of iot devices for tracking and surveillance may raise privacy concerns for individuals being monitored","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on iot devices for early diagnosis may lead to inaccurate results and mismanagement of covid-19 cases","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardization and regulation in the use of iot devices for pandemic management may result in inconsistent data collection and analysis","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Focus on covid-19 and digital technologies may overlook other contagious diseases that pose a risk to public health","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exploration of untested technologies for pandemic control","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to address immediate problems during covid-19 crisis","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on safe living environments post-covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Risks of accuracy, safety, protection, and data quality in disease surveillance and control technologies","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global pandemic infectious disease","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proliferation of iot and sensors in healthcare institutes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of robots and drones in high-risk environments","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Socio-economic divide affecting housing options and access to home delivery","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cutting corners in affordable/social housing developments","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Socio-economic divide exposed by covid-19 related design concepts","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rear extensions do not allow for a ready installation of a containment space without sacrificing room functionality or garden space","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conversion of a front room into a containment space places the containment space in the heart of the sleeping quarters","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recent homes with double garages at the front may require the owner to forgo a car parking space in order to insert a containment room module","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of living spaces may increase the risk of disease propagation due to close proximity of individuals","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for retrofitting existing building stock to pandemic-proof residential housing","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emphasis on stairs as the main mode of inter-storey communication creating public health benefit","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Narrow corridors and bottleneck positioning of doors","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation in corridor spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High density housing and communal spaces can lead to a concentration of residents and increased flow of people, which can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spatial separation and narrow corridors can create bottlenecks and bottlenecks that increase the likelihood of close contact and the spread of pathogens between individuals passing through the area","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shared access points and common bottlenecks in apartment buildings make them vulnerable to becoming hotspots for contagious diseases, leading to rapid transmission among residents","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of adequate ventilation in housing design","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate sound dampening in interior spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate airflow and ventilation in the built environment leading to the potential spread of contagious diseases","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate access to open air spaces leading to confinement-related mental health issues in isolated occupants","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to observe social distancing guidelines in communal spaces, leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Socialising in residential spaces may expose occupants to pathogens carried by visitors, including asymptomatic individuals with covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contamination of living spaces due to external clothing and footwear being brought indoors","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Permeable zone between exterior and interior in residential buildings","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dispersal of coronaviruses on surfaces in built environments","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virus survival on surfaces for prolonged periods","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
